n = 101001
arr = [000001, 101000, 101001]
arr = [100000, 101000, 101001]

n = 10111
arr = [00111, 10010, 10101, 10110, 10111]

n = 1
arr = [0, 1]  2

n = 11 
arr = [01, 10, 11] 3

n = 111 (2 + dp[1])
arr = [010, 101, 110, 111] 4

n = 1111 (2 + dp[2])
arr = [0100, 1011, 1101, 1110, 1111] 5

n = 11111 (2 + dp[3])
arr = [01000, 10111, 11010, 11101, 11110, 11111] 6

n = 111111 (2 + dp[4])
arr = [010000, 101111, 110100, 111011, 111101, 111110, 111111] 7

simple = [011111, 101111, 110111, 111011, 111101, 111110, 111111] 7
